betterquesting.name: Food
betterquesting.desc: Once you have a place to live, you need to eat.  Construct a fenced off farm area with 5 wheat planted per person.

betterquesting.name: Shelter
betterquesting.desc: The first step in any city is basic shelter. For your first task, construct a simple house (1 per player). The house must have a door, a living area, a bedroom, and a bed.

betterquesting.name: Choose Wisely
betterquesting.desc: First you must find a suitable place for your city. You will want plenty of flat land, or else you will spend a lot of time felling trees to clear ground for buildings. You will need a mineshaft, so you might want some nearby hills or mountains. You will need a port, so you should have a river or other body of water close by.  You'll need a farm early on, but can't use iron to make a bucket so plan accordingly.

betterquesting.name: Supplies
betterquesting.desc: Now you must begin storing supplies for your city. Gather a stack of planks, and 5 bread (along with somewhere to store it all!).

betterquesting.name: Feast or Fammine
betterquesting.desc: Time to start cooking. Gather some improved meals for your city.

betterquesting.name: Stockpile
betterquesting.desc: Your town is growing. Add the following to your treasury.

betterquesting.name: Livestock
betterquesting.desc: Create an animal pen and begin breeding farm animals.

betterquesting.name: More Housing
betterquesting.desc: As your city grows, build another house for it.

betterquesting.name: Town Hall
betterquesting.desc: Your town needs a central meeting hall.  Build a Town Hall that contains: a front door, a treasury, a large meeting room, and at least one other room (office, etc).

betterquesting.name: Market District
betterquesting.desc: Construct a market district with the following buildings.  3 shops or stalls. A licensing office with a lobby, 2 offices, a document storage room and a banner representing your city out front.

betterquesting.name: A Propper Mine
betterquesting.desc: Create a mine shaft that is at least 20 blocks deep.  Whenever venturing into your mine you must have some sort of helmet on to protect you. Mine shafts must be supported with wooden beams every 10 blocks.

betterquesting.name: Forestry
betterquesting.desc: Create a controlled tree farm with at least 10 trees in it.

betterquesting.name: Watchtowers
betterquesting.desc: Create watchtowers at all corners of your city wall (construct at least 2).

betterquesting.name: Mining District
betterquesting.desc: Construct a mining district near your mineshaft. In this area you should have a well for water, at least 1 house constructed, and one other community building (storage, crafting, etc).

betterquesting.name: City Walls
betterquesting.desc: Create a wall to enclose your city and protect it from attack. It must be safe from monsters within the bounds of your new wall.

betterquesting.name: Treasury
betterquesting.desc: As your city grows, your treasury dmands to be filled with more equipment for your citizens.

betterquesting.name: Mining District
betterquesting.desc: Construct 2 watchtowers nearby the mining district. Construct a blacksmith shop. Extend your mineshaft down to level 20. Connect all buildings with paths.

betterquesting.name: City Hall
betterquesting.desc: Your city has outgrown its old Town Hall.  Either upgrade your Town Hall or build a new City Hall with the following: at least 2 floors, at least 2 offices with desks, a large meeting room, a treasury, a clock or bell tower.  Paths must link the City Hall to all other buidlings within the walls.

betterquesting.name: Treasury
betterquesting.desc: Your city demands more tools and resources for your populace.

betterquesting.name: Farming District
betterquesting.desc: Upgrade your farm to include at least 20 blocks per player.

betterquesting.name: Religion
betterquesting.desc: Build a cathedral, church, or other large religious structure.

betterquesting.name: Market District
betterquesting.desc: Continue to expand your market district. Build an additional shop, bringing the number up to 4. Build a new community building (stables, inn, chapel, etc).

betterquesting.name: Port
betterquesting.desc: To the seas! The port district must contain: Two docks, with a boat. An office for the harbor master with an lobby, office and bedroom, and your city's banner outside it. One additional building (house, shop, etc).  Paths must connect all buildings and lead back to City Hall.

betterquesting.name: More to come!
betterquesting.desc: Not quite finished yet! The castle building quests will be added later.

betterquesting.name: Stage 1: Foundations
betterquesting.desc: The basics of survival.                                            In this age you can only use wooden tools. No stone or metals may be used for any purposes.  You can use what you find, but you cannot craft or process any stone or metal.

betterquesting.name: Stage 2: Building
betterquesting.desc: You may only use stone and wooden tools. You cannot use iron or any metals yet.

betterquesting.name: Stage 3: Growth
betterquesting.desc: You have progressed to the iron age. You may now smelt iron, copper or tin, and use it for crafting. You may not use gold, lead, emeralds, diamonds or redstone for any purposes yet. You can collect them though.

betterquesting.name: Stage 4: Thriving
betterquesting.desc: Your city is growing! You may now use all metals for crafting. You may use redstone now. You may only create a single Diamond tool however.

betterquesting.name: Stage 5: A Kingdom
betterquesting.desc: No description
